plans.title: Small plan
plans.Postgres: 1 medium PostgreSQL instance (8GB) - backed up + 2 'tiny' PostgreSQL instances (1GB)
plans.Logit: 1 small Logit instance (1GB) + 2 tiny Logit instances (0.5GB each)

plans.title: Medium plan
plans.Logit: 1 medium Logit instance (3GB) + 2 tiny Logit instances (0.5GB each)

plans.title: Large plan
plans.Postgres: 1 large PostgreSQL instances (16GB) + 2 medium PostgreSQL instances (8GB) + 6 tiny PostgreSQL instance (1GB)
plans.Logit: 1 large Logit instance (5GB)+ 2 tiny Logit instances (0.5GB each)
plans.Redis: 1 medium Redis instance, 2 tiny redis instances
plans.Mongo: 1 large Mongo instance + 2 tiny MongoDB instances
plans.ElasticSearch: 1 large Elastic Search instance, 2 tiny Elastic Search instances
plans.RabbitMQ: 1 large RabbitMQ instance + 2 small RabbitMQ instances

plans.title: Huge plan
plans.Postgres: 2 'huge' PostgreSQL instances (32GB) + 6 medium PostgreSQL instances (8GB) + 24 'tiny' Postgres database instances (1GB)
plans.Logit: 1 'large' Logit instance + 1 medium Logit instance + 2 tiny Logit instances (0.5GB each)
plans.ElasticSearch: 1 large Elastic Search instance, 4 tiny Elastic Search instances
